channel.title: Making an npc use range or mage
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I'm using Devolution 7.0 and I am currently wondering how to make a npc shoot a projectile or use a gfx on a player, or ultimately use range or mage. Thsi would be very much appreciated.
Thanx! :)

item.title: Making an npc use range or mage
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

Lol i know that i just need a bit of assistance in making the npc use either of them.

Read full topic
item.source: Making an npc use range or mage
